meanings.definition: A person or thing that prevents something from happening.
meanings.sent1: The security guard at the museum is one of the preventers of theft.
meanings.sent2: Fire alarms are important preventers of disasters in buildings.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape acted as a preventer, stopping the villain in their tracks.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking was a preventer, blocking any potential problems from arising.
meanings.sent5: The lock on the door served as a reliable preventer against intruders.

meanings.definition: A medication or device used to prevent a specific condition or disease.
meanings.sent1: Some people with asthma use inhalers as preventers to avoid attacks.
meanings.sent2: Sunscreen is a common preventer of sunburn during outdoor activities.
meanings.sent3: The magical necklace was jokingly referred to as a preventer of bad luck.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as a preventer, keeping negativity at bay.
meanings.sent5: The vaccine was a powerful preventer of the spread of the disease.
